text: Petracola is a genus of lizards in the family Gymnophthalmidae. The genus is endemic to Peru. ==Species== The genus Petracola contains five species which are recognized as being valid."Petracola ". The Reptile Database. www.reptile- database.org. *Petracola angustisoma *Petracola labioocularis *Petracola pajatensis *Petracola ventrimaculatus - spotted lightbulb lizard *Petracola waka Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Petracola. ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Taxa named by Tiffany M. Doan Category:Taxa named by Todd Adam Castoe
title: Petracola
